phrases: I got into an accident on my way to this planet.
And there is a problem with the system.
I would been planning on just living here...
That is why you went to Kirishima-kun's house?
So what is that mecha thing we just saw?
No, that... that is an emergency rescue pod.
The ship automatically sent a distress signal,
and it came to rescue me.
This ship does not fly, right?
Are you sure you do not want to be rescued?
I wanted to stay on this planet.
I came to look for a certain place on this planet.
I do not even know if it really exists...
But I want to go there.
We will not tell anybody you are an alien, right?
But if the Men in Black find out...
Takatsuki-senpai, I will not tell anybody.
I am sorry for the trouble.
There is no need to apologize.
Um, since we are here, can we wander around?
Tetsuro, how can you say that at a time like this?
But this is a once in a lifetime chance, right?
Do not you think so, Mio?
It is interesting, is not it?
Everybody's got to be really worried.
Oh, crap, I forgot about my sister!
Just act like you usually do, Ichika.
I am really surprised that Takatsuki-senpai's an alien.
In fact, I still cannot believe it!
I would be more likely to believe it was all just a prank.
Oh my, I would suspected it.
It sounds like a lie, but I cannot totally say so.
Because I am an agent of the Men in Black.
And what kind of joke is that?
What is Kai going to do?
It is been a really long day, has not it?
There is something I have not told you yet.
When I first came to this planet in my spaceship,
If you were not there, I might have died, right?
I used the technology from my planet to heal you,
so I was worried there might be some problems.
That is why you stayed with me?
No, do not worry about it.
Whether it was an accident or whatever...
It led me to you, and that makes me really happy.
The problem is not that she is an alien.
That is not the problem, it is...
You do not have to apologize.
I actually feel better after telling everybody.
But when the Federation Police find out that their rescue pod was destroyed,
they might send somebody to investigate.
That might cause problems for everyone.
I do not have much time.
It is been a long time since you came to my house.
Sorry for just saying I wanted to stay over all of a sudden.
Because I thought you were not sure what to do.
Now that I know Takatsuki-senpai's an alien...
What is he going to do?
If she is an alien, then someday...
When I think about that, I hate myself.
I feel like I am not being fair.
Wait, how do you know how I feel?
It is obvious, is not it?
Kaito-kun, thank you so much for everything!
I will never forget you or the time we spent together!
I will get a job or do whatever I have to, and come to see you!
I am going out for a while.
Are you going to look for that place?
I will be back by dinner.
Staying on this planet will cause problems for everyone.
I should call for rescue right now.
Why do not I go home?
I do not know what to say to Takatsuki-senpai!
Just act like you normally do.
Mio, has your personality changed since you cut your hair?
She said she was looking for the place she talked about yesterday.
Why would she be so secretive?
We would help if she asked.
She is got a lot to think about, I bet.
I heard he is the grandson of old man Kirishima at the town hall.
He lost his parents in an accident,
and came back here, my mom said.
I will introduce your new classmate.
The smile on his face made it impossible...
When I put myself in his position,
I do not think I could smile at all.
But the way he kept trying to smile...
I think that is when I started to like him.
It is just like the one he has now.
I can buy more film if I run out.
Maybe I should take an umbrella, too.
You are going to look again today, right?
I asked everybody to put the filming on hold for a while.
Um... I will go by myself.
I cannot because trouble for you.
I said we were not filming today, did not I?
Is my coming over a bad thing?
No, not bad, it is just...
I am not talking about the watermelon.
She said the problem was hers and refused.
She said good luck with the movie.
I remembered some scenery cuts I forgot.
If you go home, lock the doors here.
You can leave the key in the usual spot, okay?
What am I supposed to do with this?
He said he was going to get some scenery cuts.
This is from when we went to Karuizawa...
I did not know he took this.
Forget it, let us all eat this watermelon!
Want To go on a date with me?
Actually, she will not let me do anything.
She does not know how I feel.
Sulking because things are not going your way.
Then do you know how Ichika feels?
What do you think she was thinking and feeling...
What is she thinking and feeling now?
After all the courage it must have taken to tell you who she really is,
have you done anything for her in return?
That is what I am saying you should think about.
What can you do for her?
If you care about her, you should find your answer.
And he does not pick up his phone.
I am not coming home anymore.
I looked at FT-32, so next is PF...
Are you looking for that place again?
you are going back to your home planet, right?
I will be much happier once my rival's gone!
You know how Kaito-kun feels, right?
Cannot tell him because you are an alien?
And you cannot be with him because you cannot stay here forever?
Are you going to use that as an excuse to just keep running from him?
I am looking for that place
You are pretending to look as hard as you can
so you do not have to look at him.
I do not have a choice!
You can be with the person you like!
Is not that a good thing?
It is something I cannot have no matter how much I want it,
and you can have it just by reaching out.
And all you do is make excuses and run.
You do not even know what Kaito-kun is doing right now!
Is it that fun to watch me be rejected?
Were you just pretending to help me so you could see this happen?
There is a tree and a lake...
Jeez... nobody asked you to be so cool.
You were looking for it for me, were not you?
I was thinking I had to go home.
Because I would because problems for everyone.
But I did not want to.
Tanigawa-san made me realize that the reason I did not want to leave...
Is it okay that I am an alien?
Can I tell you I like you?
From the first time I saw you, I think.
I do not think I knew,
Um, this is my first time, so...
The first time was at the dam.
The second was when you collapsed in the entryway.
The third was when the rescue pod attacked.
It was to put the healing nanomachines in my body inside you.
That is not romantic at all.
Just like joy exists because of sadness,
someone is always crying in the shadow of someone is happiness.
strong feelings do not go away.
